mapper.sql:
FROM shop.infrmember a WHERE 1=1
AND ifmmDelNy = 1 AND ifmmDelNy = 0
AND ifmmName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfmmName},'%')
AND ifmmName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifmmId LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND a.regDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND a.modDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND a.ifmmDob BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd}
mapper.select:
select a.ifmmSeq ,a.ifmmName ,a.ifmmId ,a.ifmmPassword ,a.ifmmDob ,a.ifmmDelNy ,b.ifmeEmailFull ,c.ifmpNumber ,d.ifmaAddress1 ,d.ifmaAddress2
from shop.infrmember a LEFT JOIN infrmemberEmail b on a.ifmmSeq = b.ifmmSeq AND b.ifmeDelNy = 0 LEFT JOIN infrmemberPhone c on a.ifmmSeq = c.ifmmSeq AND c.ifmpDelNy = 0 LEFT JOIN infrmemberAddress d on a.ifmmSeq = d.ifmmSeq AND d.ifmaDelNy = 0 where 1=1 and a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
select a.ifmmSeq ,a.ifmmId ,a.ifmmName ,a.ifmmPassword ,a.ifmmDelNy from shop.infrmember a where 1=1 and ifmmId = #{ifmmId} and ifmmPassword = #{ifmmPassword}
select a.ifmmSeq ,a.ifmmId ,a.ifmmName ,a.ifmmPassword ,a.ifmmDelNy from shop.infrmember a where 1=1 and ifmmId = #{ifmmId} and ifmmPassword = #{ifmmPassword}
